definition: same as 慢慢吃[man4 man4 chi1]
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Sir, all your dishes are served, please enjoy your meal.
sentences.chinese: 先生，您点的菜都上齐了，请慢用。

sentences.english: Did is you order, enjoy your self, please.
This food is best eaten while hot. Please enjoy your meat.
sentences.chinese: 这道菜最好趁热吃请慢用。

sentences.english: Here's a free carrot cake for you, please enjoy it.
sentences.chinese: 这是送给您免费品尝的胡萝卜蛋糕，请慢用。

sentences.english: Here you are, your tonic water.
sentences.chinese: 这是您的汤力水，请慢用。

sentences.english: W. S: Is that right sir? Take your time, please.
sentences.chinese: 是那样的吗？先生，请你慢用。

sentences.english: Please enjoy it! And can I take this away?
sentences.chinese: 请慢用，这个可以给你撤走吗？

sentences.english: However, the export is, please slow.
sentences.chinese: 可是，出口的却是，请慢用。

sentences.english: Please take your time, sir. Glad to be your service.
sentences.chinese: 先生请慢用，很高兴为您服务。

sentences.english: Your beer, sir. Please enjoy your drink.
The food is best eaten while hot. Please enjoy your meal.
sentences.chinese: 这道菜最好趁热吃，请慢用。

sentences.english: This is your beef steak with black pepper and pasta, Hope you'll enjoy it.
sentences.chinese: 这是您的黑椒牛肉配意大利面，请慢用。

definition: goodbye (modest formula)/Excuse me, I must leave.
Please do as you wish!/You are welcome to do whatever you like!/Please make yourself at home.
to petition for retirement (old)/to ask for leave to withdraw/to ask to be excused
to do as one pleases/to not inconvenience oneself
to say goodbye/to take one's leave
(said by departing guest) no need to see me out
food and drink/food to accompany wine
you're welcome/don't mention it/no need to stand on ceremony
to half rise out of one's chair (a polite gesture)
(polite) thank you for your trouble (used when asking a favor or after having received one)
